properties.publicRemarks:
AVAILABLE JULY 1st THROUGH SEPTEMBER 25th at this exceptional rate!! Experience resort-style living this summer in this stunning home, located in the coveted gated community of Escena. Set against breathtaking mountain and lake views, this beautifully designed 3-bedroom, 3-bath residence plus office is now available at an incredible off-season rate.

Every detail has been thoughtfully curated, from the designer finishes to the open-concept living, dining, and kitchen spaces that flow seamlessly together. A full wall of folding glass doors brings the outdoors in, framing spectacular views and leading to a private backyard oasis complete with an infinity-edge pool, oversized spa, and built-in BBQ — the perfect setting for both relaxation and entertaining.

Inside, the chef's kitchen features premium upgrades including a double oven, five-burner cooktop, and dishwasher, fully stocked and ready for you to whip up anything from relaxed brunches to sunset dinners. A cozy feature fireplace anchors the living area, along with a wet bar perfect for gathering over evening cocktails or casual get-togethers with friends.

The spacious primary suite offers direct access to the back patio and features a stunning accent wall, while the spa-inspired en suite bath pampers with a soaking tub, large walk-in shower, and expansive double vanity. Two additional guest bedrooms each provide walk-in closets, with one featuring its own private en suite bath. A separate office adds flexibility for remote work or extra guest space.

Additional highlights include custom blinds and draperies throughout, a whole-home entertainment system, a collection of games for cozy nights in, a generous laundry room, a two-car epoxy garage, and energy-efficient solar panels.

Set along a double fairway with public golf access, and part of a gated community featuring a dog park and beautifully maintained grounds, this home blends privacy, luxury, and convenience — just minutes from downtown Palm Springs and the airport.

Fully furnished, thoughtfully equipped, and move-in ready for a memorable summer. Escape, unwind, and savor every sunny day — this unforgettable retreat is ready and waiting.

properties.publicRemarks:
Experience iconic Palm Springs living with unobstructed views of majestic Mt. San Jacinto from this exquisitely updated mid-century modern treasure!
Originally designed by celebrated architect William Krisel and built by the renowned Alexander Construction Co., this 3-bedroom home is tucked away in the highly desirable Racquet Club Estates. Walls of glass flood the interiors with natural light, seamlessly blending indoor and outdoor living across multiple inviting entertainment spaces.

The chef's kitchen is a standout, offering high-end stainless appliances, quartz countertops, generous storage, and a custom walnut bar — perfect for effortless gatherings. Both bathrooms have been thoughtfully renovated with contemporary touches that honor the home's original charm.

Privacy abounds behind the signature shadow block front wall and mature hedging that surrounds the backyard oasis. Outdoor amenities include a refreshing pool with its own shower and bath, a covered patio ideal for al fresco dining, and a cozy fireplace that invites evening relaxation.

Energy-efficient upgrades such as Milgard windows, a newer HVAC system, and leased solar panels ensure both comfort and sustainability. Architectural purists will appreciate the iconic post-and-beam construction, tongue-and-groove ceilings, and clerestory windows that preserve the timeless spirit of the era.

Featured in Houzz, Atomic Ranch Magazine, and Dwell.com, this exceptional property offers the ultimate Palm Springs lifestyle — just minutes from downtown's world-class shopping, dining, and entertainment.

properties.publicRemarks:
Come and experience true resort living in the gated community of Four Seasons. This impressive home is move in ready at just under 2000 sq. Ft. and is available fully furnished or unfurnished with a wonderful open floor plan. There are new floors throughout, custom painting, new fixtures, landscaping, and fans.
The kitchen which has ample counter space, a large island, and a huge pantry is open to the family room that has a media niche and fireplace which overlooks the back yard that boarders the desert and has complete
privacy. There is a covered patio and grassy areas and even room for a pool if you would like. This flow makes entertaining simple and easy. There are 2 bedrooms and 2 baths in this split plan, both with new countertops & fixtures. The primary bedroom is generous in size with an oversized walk in closet and large private bathroom. The guest room is completely separate and also has an oversized closet. There is also a large laundry room with new countertop & sink, and easy  access to the garage. Four Seasons is a vibrant 55+ social community with something for everyone. The HOA membership includes high-speed fiber optic internet and access to all the community heated pools and spas; as well as full access to the Lodge with an extensive list of amenities that includes a fitness center.

properties.publicRemarks:
This is an incredibly wonderful home! Walk into a spacious and well-lit foyer where, to your immediate right, is a double-door office or, if preferred, a television/media room. Further down the foyer, you will be guided into the living room space. A wall of built-in shelving and cupboards can display your items or framed family photos. Just to the right of the shelving is a gas fireplace. To the left is the dining area adjacent to the well-appointed kitchen. Yes, this kitchen can manage multiple people, so plan accordingly! Just to the immediate left of the shelving system is a hallway leading you to your primary bedroom and a primary bathroom that is a wonder unto itself. Two closets have built-in dresser drawers and plenty of closet hanging space. The bathroom has a walk-in shower that can easily accommodate two people. When you're all cleaned up, head back to the office/media room, and then on your left, you'll see your walk-in laundry room. Down the hallway, you will see the garage passage door on your right, and the entry to the second bathroom is on your left.
Lastly, further down the hall is the second bedroom.  Yes, this home has quite a bit of space, and you will not be disappointed.  The house is fenced in for privacy, and it overlooks the desert and lights in the near distance, yet far enough away to keep noise to zero. If you want a swim or tennis time, drive to the clubhouse and enjoy all those amenities. The clubhouse is an active venue, and you will find yourself welcomed. Look at this home and see how it can not be beat in the area. Four Seasons is a great community and is greeted by all.

properties.publicRemarks: $20,500 Price Improvement! Very rare 4 bedroom with detached Casita offering 2,637 Sq Ft in stunning Four Seasons 55+ gated community in Palm Springs! Majestic panoramic mountain views, complete with private sparkling pool & spa. Newly owned Solar, all new tile throughout, new SS appliances, new paint, new dual pane doors & windows, new fixtures, new landscaping, totally updated and move-in ready! Offering high ceilings throughout, huge living room with gas fireplace, formal dining room and gourmet kitchen with center island and granite countertops. The large Primary suite opens out to your backyard pool oasis, while the bathroom features two walk-in closets, a soaking tub, dual vanities plus a walk-in shower. Distinctive second and third bedrooms are located far away from the Primary. Separate laundry rm plus a 2 car attached garage makes for easy direct access. The fully staffed lodge is where friends & family gather to enjoy scores of amenities with a calendar full of social events. Included is a fitness center, aerobics, ballroom, game rm & library. Community amenities include pools & spas, BBQ area, tennis, pickleball, hand & paddle ball, basketball courts, walking trails and more. Only minutes away is the heart of Palm Springs, packed with shopping, restaurants, social establishments, a World Class Casino and so much more. Low HOA's include Frontier's fiber optic internet. Come here and live the Palm Springs Lifestyle!

properties.publicRemarks: Fabulously Fun Palm Springs Oasis FURNISHED with Stunning Views of Mt San Jacinto AND OWNED SOLAR ! This phenomenally renovated 4 bedroom, 2 bathroom pool home, nestled on a  generously oversized lot offers dramatic views on FEE Land with eco friendly solar power, making it both stylish and sustainable Step into an open living space that is as cozy as it is chic, with tile throughout. The Dining Area is open to a modern Kitchen with quality appliances upgraded cabinetry and counters, completed by a Breakfast Bar. A Culinary Playground for creating delicious bites and hosting unforgettable gatherings!  The interior laundry room, directly off the Kitchen/ Dining Area offers convenience! The Primary Suite is your ultimate retreat with a spa inspired ensuite bathroom and private access to the backyard.  Three additional  charming bedrooms provide space for everyone making every visit feel like a mini vacation! Step outside and be amazed by your private wonderland with sunny pool/spa, mature landscaping and enchanting gazebo. The perfect haven for BBQs, pool parties and more! Completed by a two car garage  circular driveway and TURNKEY Furnished ready to enjoyed NOW!  No HOAs here! Minutes away form Downtown Palm Springs, with shopping dining and entertainment. Let the festivities begin... Come enjoy the iconic Palm Springs Lifestyle... YOUR CHIC RETREAT!

properties.publicRemarks: Executive property is Desert Park Estates available for one year lease. Top to bottom this house has undergone an extensive and thoughtful renovation. New kitchen, floors, windows and doors. Like em big? Both bedrooms are en suite. Each with 2 sets of closets, private baths, smart mirrors, large double sink, and built in cabinets. Inside the open concept custom kitchen you'll find tons of whisper quiet cabinets, all new appliances, and an island for food prep, entertaining, or hanging out in with your morning coffee. A generous light filled living room has a cheeky vintage office nook and walls of glass that lead onto the expansive patio with Big yard, Big pool, and Big views. If that's not enough there's a powder room next to the office nook that leads to a Big garage with room for 2 cars and all your toys. New landscaping, sprinklers and outdoor lights in front and back make this private Desert home a breeze. Home is unfurnished. Albertsons, Victoria Park, and Gene Autry Trail are all nearby. Please visit our open house days to view.
